section.title: TIM_OCInitTypeDef Struct Reference

para.para: TIM Output Compare Init structure definition

section.title: Detailed Description
section.para: TIM Output Compare Init structure definition

section.section:
Field Documentation
TIM_OCIdleState TIM_OCIdleStateTIM_OCInitTypeDef TIM_OCInitTypeDefTIM_OCIdleState
uint16_t TIM_OCIdleState
Specifies the TIM Output Compare pin state during Idle state. This parameter can be a value of TIM_Output_Compare_Idle_State Note
This parameter is valid only for TIM1 and TIM8.
TIM_OCMode TIM_OCModeTIM_OCInitTypeDef TIM_OCInitTypeDefTIM_OCMode
uint16_t TIM_OCMode
Specifies the TIM mode. This parameter can be a value of TIM_Output_Compare_and_PWM_modes
TIM_OCNIdleState TIM_OCNIdleStateTIM_OCInitTypeDef TIM_OCInitTypeDefTIM_OCNIdleState
uint16_t TIM_OCNIdleState
Specifies the TIM Output Compare pin state during Idle state. This parameter can be a value of TIM_Output_Compare_N_Idle_State Note
This parameter is valid only for TIM1 and TIM8.
TIM_OCNPolarity TIM_OCNPolarityTIM_OCInitTypeDef TIM_OCInitTypeDefTIM_OCNPolarity
uint16_t TIM_OCNPolarity
Specifies the complementary output polarity. This parameter can be a value of TIM_Output_Compare_N_Polarity Note
This parameter is valid only for TIM1 and TIM8.
TIM_OCPolarity TIM_OCPolarityTIM_OCInitTypeDef TIM_OCInitTypeDefTIM_OCPolarity
uint16_t TIM_OCPolarity
Specifies the output polarity. This parameter can be a value of TIM_Output_Compare_Polarity
TIM_OutputNState TIM_OutputNStateTIM_OCInitTypeDef TIM_OCInitTypeDefTIM_OutputNState
uint16_t TIM_OutputNState
Specifies the TIM complementary Output Compare state. This parameter can be a value of TIM_Output_Compare_N_State Note
This parameter is valid only for TIM1 and TIM8.
TIM_OutputState TIM_OutputStateTIM_OCInitTypeDef TIM_OCInitTypeDefTIM_OutputState
uint16_t TIM_OutputState
Specifies the TIM Output Compare state. This parameter can be a value of TIM_Output_Compare_State
TIM_Pulse TIM_PulseTIM_OCInitTypeDef TIM_OCInitTypeDefTIM_Pulse
uint32_t TIM_Pulse
Specifies the pulse value to be loaded into the Capture Compare Register. This parameter can be a number between 0x0000 and 0xFFFF
The documentation for this struct was generated from the following file: CUBE_IDE/VGA/Core/Inc/stm32f4xx_tim.h
